moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Webcam
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will allow the user to detect installed webcams (with
          the LIST action) or take a snapshot (with the SNAPSHOT) action.
author: sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: INDEX
options.description: The index of the webcam to use
